author: Mike Butler
comment: It's ok except it no longer shows steps - just distance walked, and doesn't show heart rate - can only link to heart app.

author: Richard Salinas
comment: This is a great watch face. It functions as advertised, but has one flaw that I've noticed. It doesn't obey the Android Wear brightness setting. I have my android wear bright setting on the watch set to auto. So in the dark the watch should not be very bright, and in bright light it should be very bright.   Perhaps it is something in the application the developer can look into and fix.This would help a lot with battery life.  Other than that, it is working great. Would have given a 5, except for this one flaw.

author: Howard Gannaway
comment: If you're an infogeek you'll love this watch face. You can pack so much information and launchers on it you will never feel alone! My favourite is Shazam right on the watch face - so much easier than fumbling for my phone as the music ends before I get it out of my pocket.

author: Ali AL
comment: Tons of info, fully customizable. Very detailed Fit data and weather info. Features like hourly chime and disconnect notice mean you don't have to install additional apps to get tons of functionality. No downsides, makes my Wear the best it can be.

author: Tim A
comment: I can customize the icons on the watch face to quickly launch apps. But everyone my watch disconnects from my phone, I have to restart my watch in order to use the music control feature since it doesn't recognize when my watch reconnects.

author: Nikolay Pavlov
comment: Pretty nice and useful face! The controls are kinda small (at least on my watch, Polar M600), but one gets used to it.   Suggestions:  The settings in the phone app could be split in different screens, the way it is now, one has to scroll a lot in order to find a setting.  Option not to show seconds on clock + three-letter month could free up space.

author: David Pashley
comment: Repeated advert notifications for other watch faces on my phone.

author: Rick Reeves
comment: I love the 7 indicators/complications and all the features of this face but I wish you could add a custom photo background.

author: Alejandro Castro
comment: Needed an watchface with a lot of shortcuts for apps and this one is perfect

author: Adam Sledd
comment: Great except weather needs refreshing a lot.

author: Allan Palmer
comment: Love this watch face.

author: Caz Mar
comment: Good one!

author: Will Walker
comment: I love ❤️ it

author: BJ Hermsen
comment: Daily advertising for other husky dev watch faces is excessive. I was going to purchase premium but that turned me off completely from all of your products

author: Francois Bouffard
comment: With the application avalable on this apps and a simple tap on my Asus smartwatch2 I can make Hangout vocal message, phone call, activate google map directions, stop streaming on my TV

author: Susanne Tillberg
comment: Like it a lot but will have to uninstall since it drains the battery on my 360. Wish I had not paid for the premium!

author: Britt Thurman
comment: Gives me enough buttons around the face, so I don't have to go searching the menu for apps I use every day!

author: Mitebsyco Zeug
comment: I like it except that it won't sync with Google fit. Keeps telling me to close and reopen fit.

author: Erritt Smith
comment: It's a great idea

author: Anthony Leone
comment: There's little things here and there that I wish I had more control over, but the 1 thing that drives me crazy is the launcher font.. It's so small that it's not legible on my Asus zenwatch 2. You can't resize it, or remove it either. It makes me want to remove the launcher as a work around, which you also can't do. The digital clock in ambient mode is really small too, and if you disable the left or right quick actions and then re-enable it, it creates an icon for the launch area that isn't supposed to be seen. And the launcher icon drops below the rest of the icons, which isn't how it looks in the pictures.. I'd pay just to have all those fixed..

author: Freda Driscoll-Sbar
comment: Looks great but cannot get it to sync with Google fit. Very frustrating.

author: Tom Bowers
comment: I like the ability to put several app shortcuts on watch face,  but wished a Dev would allow for more.

author: Dawn-renae Ann Stevens
comment: Love this has everything I need in it.

author: Rob Damiani
comment: Another fantastic, highly customizable, informative watch face from HuskyDev. Highly recommend this watch face

author: Ayan G
comment: Really useful watch face easy access

author: Linda Ritchie
comment: I am enjoying this watch face.

author: Rick Montague
comment: Awesome

author: Karl Gingerich
comment: This watch face is fine EXCEPT that it goes to the lowest level of brightness all the time and no setting I can find will to fix it! In daylight, it is impossible to read the display in low brightness!  Asus Zenwatch 2

author: Mohamad Hussein
comment: Very well designed to allow for easy access to essentials saving a few steps. One important feature, especially with the Huawei watch 2, is the ability to change the brightness where this system function didn't air to work well but the app overcomes this glitch. Really nice job!!

Like all of his info watch faces. I would just like the option I've seen on other watch faces to set the size of the icons and the time and date. I use his everyday watch face a little more because the time is bigger and easier to read. Other than that it's a great watch face with a lot of controls that works well

author: rec DNA
comment: Digital watch face font too small for me to read. Need access to Zenfit rather than Fit for my Zenwatch. Complications I like are watch battery, phkne battery, unread gmail, asus zenfit, shortcut to another app

author: Elizabeth Bell
comment: Love this watch face does everything  it says .Also great on battery.One of my best so far.

author: Sean Preece
comment: Would give five but colour wheel doesn't allow for grays just white black or colours

author: Carl Hauck
comment: Purchased premium and now it is asking to purchase premium again?

author: Seamus Fitzpatrick
comment: All of the garbage faces makes this look fantastic.

author: Neil Wilson
comment: Best free watch face.

author: Anders Østmoe
comment: It's the best watch face I have used. When I installed it, it connected directly to the high quality governmental weather service. BUT after a couple of days it stopped working, and now I have to use Open Weather Map, and the weather forecast seems to be much less accurate. Please fix this, connection to the governmental service is great!

author: Dan Brewer
comment: Does a lot of stuff

author: Bob Veitch
comment: Great face

author: Tim Abeyta
comment: 999% locked down for "premium" features, featured free on other watches
